SELECT f.facility_idx, COALESCE(SUM(fr.head_count), 0) AS total_head_count, f.capacity - COALESCE(SUM(fr.head_count), 0) AS remaining_capacity FROM facility f LEFT JOIN facility_reserve fr ON f.facility_idx = fr.facility_idx AND fr.reserve_date = '${reserveDate}' AND fr.reserve_time = ${reserveTime} WHERE f.facility_idx = ${facilityIdx} GROUP BY f.facility_idx, f.capacity
